name: Make Tender Beef Tips and Gravy
description: You can make amazingly tender beef tips and gravy in an Instant Pot or slow cooker.

author.name: Stephanie Manley
author.description: I recreate your favorite restaurant recipes, so you can prepare these dishes at home. I help you cook dinner, and serve up dishes you know your family will love. You can find most of the ingredients for all of the recipes in your local grocery store. Stephanie is the author of CopyKat.com's Dining Out in the Home, and CopyKat.com's Dining Out in the Home 2.

publisher.name: CopyKat Recipes
publisher.description: You have loved that recipe in the restaurant, now make that recipe at home.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl add flour, salt, and pepper. Stir the salt and pepper into the flour. Cut and trim roast into small bite-sized pieces. Dredge beef pieces in seasoned flour shake off excess flour.

itemListElement.text: Set the Instant Pot to saute, add oil. When the oil has heated drop in several pieces of the beef. Cook seasoned beef on all sides until lightly browned. Cook beef in small batches. When all of the beef is cooked add it back to the Instant Pot.

Add 1 cup of onion, two teaspoons of Gravy Master, and beef stock. Place lid on high and cook for 15 minutes on high pressure. Release pot after cooking with either a quick release or a natural release.
Brown the beef in a large skillet in small batches with some vegetable oil. Add the browned beef, beef broth, onion, and Gravy Master to the slow cooker. Cook for 4 to 6 hours on low.

If the liquid hasn't thickened up to your desired consistency, you can thicken it up by mixing 1 tablespoon of butter and one tablespoon of flour together. Stir this into the liquid and it will thicken up the gravy in the slow cooker.
Prepare noodles or rice according to package instructions.
Serve beef tips and gravy over noodles or rice.

video.name: Instant Pot Beef Tips and Gravy
video.description: Beef tips and gravy can be made simply in an Instant Pot. An Instant Pot is a type of pressure cooker. You can make beef tips with a lean cut of beef in a short amount of time. The beef tips naturally make a delicious gravy that can quickly turn into dinner in no time. You will need 1 cup of flour 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon black pepper 2 pounds of lean chuck roast 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil 2 teaspoons gravy master 1 cup of onions Cook rice or noodles your choice In a small bowl add flour, salt, and pepper. Stir the salt and pepper into the flour. Cut and trim roast into small bite sized pieces. Dredge beef pieces in seasoned flour shake off excess flour. Set the Instant Pot to saute, add oil. When the oil has heated drop in several pieces of the beef. Cook seasoned beef on all sides until lightly browned. Cook beef in small batches. When all of the beef is cooked add it back to the Instant Pot. Add 1 cup of onion, two teaspoons of Gravy Master, and beef stock. Place lid on high and cook for 15 minutes on high pressure. Release pressure after cooking with either a quick release or a natural release. More information and a printable recipe card here: https://copykat.com/make-tender-beef-tips-in-gravy/
